article_title: Glenview's Larry Robbins Still Betting On Healthcare Amid Supreme Court Obamacare Battle

article_metadata.description: Larry Robbins of Glenview Capital Management is taking a longer view when it comes to hospitals and other healthcare sector stocks. No matter which way the court rules, he sees reasonable growth rates for the sector, especially in a weak economic backdrop.
article_metadata.author: Antoine Gara
